resources.string: Your news feed is empty.\n\nTo add articles, add a category using the Add Category Button
This android application parses RSS feeds and displays the contents into an easy to read and unified place.\n\nCreated by: Benjamin Glover (2/27/2016)

Add a new source of information from either a provided sample of RSS feeds or enter your own by pressing the "Add Category" button.
 After a new source is entered into the list, press the back button to return to the News Feed.
 There, the articles will populate and able to be clicked and view.

Enjoy your readings!
